cause.description:
Riley's Friends is a network of people who are helping to educate the general public about people with Down's Syndrome. Despite the public perception, people with Down's Syndrome are regular, normal people, who live life, and enjoy every minute of it. Itis dedicated to my 3 year old son, Riley, who has Down's Syndrome.
1. Educate about the capabilities of someone with Down's Syndrome
2. Educate on how to interact with people with Down's Syndrome
3. Create a positive environment for people with Down's Syndrome to grow up in
cause.mission: educate the general population about Down's Syndrome
cause.name: Riley's Friends
